original_title: Adulterous Sex With A Married Woman With An Ultimate Body That Blows Your Reasoning Power Away. Sumire Mizukawa
overview: The protagonist works in an office and has been losing his mind thinking about the president’s hot trophy wife: Mizukawa, who also works in the company.  One day, they end up working overtime alone, and she was receptive.
title: Adulterous Sex With A Married Woman With An Ultimate Body That Blows Your Reasoning Power Away. Sumire Mizukawa
